entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:20 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 02:55 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -13.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
